trans-unit.source: Defines the methods, properties, and events for server-side access to the HTML5 <xref uid="langword_csharp_input" name="input" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Define os métodos, propriedades e eventos do lado do servidor de acesso para o HTML5 <xref uid="langword_csharp_input" name="input" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl"></xref> class based on the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl"> </xref> classe com base no tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The type of the control.
trans-unit.target: O tipo do controle.

trans-unit.source: Processes the postback data for the HTML5 <xref uid="langword_csharp_input" name="input" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Processa os dados de postagem para o HTML5 <xref uid="langword_csharp_input" name="input" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: The index in the posted collection that references the content to load.
trans-unit.target: O índice na coleção lançada que referencia o conteúdo a ser carregado.

trans-unit.source: The collection of all posted values.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de todos os valores postados.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the posted content differs from the content in a previous postback; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o conteúdo publicado for diferente do conteúdo em uma nova postagem anterior; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl.ServerChange"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl.ServerChange"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl.OnServerChange*> method when the posted data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl"></xref> element has changed.
trans-unit.target: Invoca o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl.OnServerChange*>método quando os dados publicados para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl"> </xref> elemento mudou.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl.OnServerChange*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the content of the HTML5 <xref uid="langword_csharp_input" name="input" href=""></xref> element changes between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o conteúdo do HTML5 <xref uid="langword_csharp_input" name="input" href=""> </xref> alterações de elemento entre postagens para o servidor.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, processes postback data for an HTML5 <xref uid="langword_csharp_input" name="input" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada em uma classe derivada, processos postback dados para um HTML5 <xref uid="langword_csharp_input" name="input" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl>instância é convertida em um <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>interface.</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl>

trans-unit.source: The index in the posted collection that references the content to load.
trans-unit.target: O índice na coleção lançada que referencia o conteúdo a ser carregado.

trans-unit.source: The collection of all posted values.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de todos os valores postados.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the state of the HTML5 <xref uid="langword_csharp_input" name="input" href=""></xref> element changes because of the postback; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o estado do HTML5 <xref uid="langword_csharp_input" name="input" href=""> </xref> alterações de elemento devido a postagem; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl.OnServerChange*> method when the posted data for the HTML5 <xref uid="langword_csharp_input" name="input" href=""></xref> element has changed.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada, chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl.OnServerChange*>método quando os dados publicados para o HTML5 <xref uid="langword_csharp_input" name="input" href=""> </xref> elemento mudou.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl.OnServerChange*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl>instância é convertida em um <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>interface.</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl>
